CustomField.description: Product the team interested in purchasing LD is working on.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determine what product the team interested in purchasing LD is working on. If this account is Viacom, ask 'What part of Viacom?' In addition to product name, please note what the team is working on (e.g., core product, mobile app or an internal tool).
CustomField.label: What is the product?
